about_the_game:
Game story background
Alien planets also have life and their own worlds, but they are still primitive animal tribes. Human beings cannot understand the civilization between animals, without alien humans to disturb them, nor can they disturb their world.
Several strange girls traveled across their planet from unknown places, disturbing the civilized world of these small animals.

This game product is a semi-finished game work of personal independent game, and the game operation is divided into two parts: survival mode and Musou mode.
Survival mode: avoid the pursuit of monsters, and reach the end, complete the game clearance, defeat the monsters in the way, maze-like game levels, explore the map to find the end.
Musou Mode: Unparalleled mowing gameplay, a large wave of monsters attack, quickly defeat them, find the Boss and defeat it, and complete the game clearance.

Game story background
Alien planets also have life and their own worlds, but they are still primitive animal tribes. Human beings cannot understand the civilization between animals, without alien humans to disturb them, nor can they disturb their world.

name: FantasyKingdom：Fantasy Tiny Forest

subs.option_text: 幻灵界：幻想小森林(fantasyKingdom：Fantasy Tiny Forest) - $9.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050TI
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
